User facing web interface flask app¶

webinterface.add_user(username, password_to_set, adminpass)[source]¶

creates a new user on the pi. checks to see whether the user is an admin. also checks to see whether the user is trying to change their own password. :param username: :param password_to_set: :param adminpass: :return:
